'''Of Kites and New Sights''' is a [[Login Event]] in [[Version 4.4]].

==Event Details==
===Duration===
* 2024/02/24 00:00:00 until the end of Version 4.4 (2024/03/13 05:59 UTC+8)

===Requirements===
* [[Adventure Rank]] 2 or above

===Summary===
* During the event, log in to the game to receive [[Intertwined Fate]]s, [[Fragile Resin]], [[Sanctifying Unction]], and other rewards!
* Each [[mail]] can be collected until the end of the event.
* The mail will expire after 30 days, so don't forget to claim the rewards in time.
